data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Seine-Maritime.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Seine-Maritime, Normandie, France

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Seine-Maritime, Normandie, France a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 81 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 15,672 believers living in Seine-Maritime, Normandie, France.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Seine-Maritime words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sotteville-lès-Rouen
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sotteville-lès-Rouen, Normandie, France.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Seine-Maritime.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 15,672 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Seine-Maritime.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Seine-Maritime, Normandie, France that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

location.name: Seine-Maritime
location.cities_list: Le Havre, Rouen, Dieppe, Sotteville-lès-Rouen, Saint-Étienne-du-Rouvray
location.cities_list_w_pop: Le Havre (185,972), Rouen (112,787), Dieppe (35,707), Sotteville-lès-Rouen (30,619), Saint-Étienne-du-Rouvray (28,953)
